nodes.name: Set ElevenLabs voice ID and text

values.name: text
values.stringValue: =Après, on a fait la sieste, Camille a travaillé pour French Today et j’ai étudié un peu, et puis Camille a proposé de suivre une visite guidée de l’Abbaye de Beauport qui commençait à 17 heures. On a marché environ vingt minutes, et je m’arrêtais souvent pour prendre des photos : la baie de Paimpol est si jolie ! Mais Camille m’a dit : « Dépêche-toi Sunny ! La visite guidée commence dans cinq minutes. » Donc, j’ai bougé mes fesses et on est arrivées à l’abbaye

parameters.content: 1] In ElevenLabs, add a voice to your [voice lab]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} and copy its ID. Open this node and add the ID there

parameters.content:
2] Get your ElevenLabs API key (click your name in the bottom-left of [ElevenLabs]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} and choose ‘profile’)

In this node, create a new header auth cred. Set the name to `xi-api-key` and the value to your API key

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
### About
This workflow takes some French text, and translates it into spoken audio.

It then transcribes that audio back into text, translates it into English and generates an audio file of the English text

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Lmchatopenai Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Lmchatopenai Workflow. This workflow integrates 7 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, chainLlm, set, stopAndError. It contains 19 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 19
- **Node Types**: 7
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **When clicking "Execute Workflow"**: manualTrigger
- **Generate French Audio**: httpRequest
- **Set ElevenLabs voice ID and text**: set
- **Translate Text to English**: chainLlm
- **Translate English text to speech**: httpRequest
- **Transcribe Audio**: httpRequest
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note4**: stickyNote
- ... and 9 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
